verses.verse: <S%G2532>Now<s%> on the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> very <S%G3722>early<s%> in the morning, they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3418>sepulcher,<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> the <S%G759>spices<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G2090>prepared,<s%> and certain others with them.
And they <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G617>rolled<s%> <S%G617>away<s%> from the <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>
And they <S%G1525>entered<s%> in, and <S%G2147>found<s%> not the <S%G4983>body<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as they were <S%G1280>much<s%> <S%G1280>perplexed<s%> <S%G4012>thereabout,<s%> <S%G5127><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2186>stood<s%> by them in <S%G797>shining<s%> <S%G2067>garments:<s%>

And as they were <S%G1719>afraid,<s%> and <S%G2827>bowed<s%> down their <S%G4383>faces<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> you the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> the <S%G3498>dead?<s%>
He is not <S%G5602>here,<s%> but is <S%G1453>risen:<s%> <S%G3415>remember<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to you when he was <S%G2089>yet<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G268>sinful<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> and be <S%G4717>crucified,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>
And they <S%G3415>remembered<s%> his <S%G4487>words,<s%>
And <S%G5290>returned<s%> from the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things to the <S%G1733>eleven,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3062>rest.<s%>

It was <S%G3137>Mary<s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%>and <S%G2489>Joanna,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the mother of <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G3062>other<s%> women that were with them, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things to the <S%G652>apostles.<s%>
And their <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G5316>seemed<s%> to them as <S%G3026>idle<s%> <S%G3026>tales,<s%> and they <S%G569>believed<s%> them not.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G5143>ran<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher;<s%> and <S%G3879>stooping<s%> <S%G3879>down,<s%> he <S%G991>beheld<s%> the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>clothes<s%> <S%G2749>laid<s%> by <S%G3441>themselves,<s%> and <S%G565>departed,<s%> <S%G2296>wondering<s%> in <S%G1438>himself<s%> at that which was <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of them <S%G4198>went<s%> that <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> to a <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G3686>called<s%> <S%G1695>Emmaus,<s%> which was from <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> about three <S%G1835>score<s%> <S%G4712>furlongs.<s%>
And they <S%G3656>talked<s%> <S%G4314>together<s%> <S%G240><s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> things which had <S%G4819>happened.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that, <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3588><s%> they <S%G3656>communed<s%> together and <S%G4802>reasoned,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> drew <S%G1448>near,<s%> and <S%G4848>went<s%> with them.
But their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G2902>held<s%> that they should not <S%G1921>know<s%> him.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>What<s%> manner of communications <S%G3056><s%> are <S%G3778>these<s%> that you <S%G474>have<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> as you <S%G4043>walk,<s%> and are sad? <S%G4659><s%>

And the <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G2810>Cleopas,<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Are you <S%G3441>only<s%> a <S%G3939>stranger<s%> in <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and have not <S%G1097>known<s%> the things which are <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass <S%G1722>there<s%> <S%G846><s%> in <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G2250>days?<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4169>What<s%> things? And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4012>Concerning<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> and <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1726>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people:<s%>

And <S%G3704>how<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and our <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him to be <S%G1519>condemned<s%> <S%G2917><s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> and <S%G474>have<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> him.

But we <S%G1679>trusted<s%> that it had <S%G2076>been<s%> he which <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G474>have<s%> <S%G3084>redeemed<s%> <S%G2474>Israel:<s%> and <S%G4862>beside<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5125>this,<s%> to <S%G4594>day<s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things were <S%G1096>done.<s%>

<S%G235>Yes,<s%> and <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of our company <S%G1839>made<s%> us <S%G1839>astonished,<s%> which were <S%G3721>early<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulcher;<s%>

And when they <S%G2147>found<s%> not his <S%G4983>body,<s%> they <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> that they had <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> a <S%G3701>vision<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> that he was <S%G2198>alive.<s%>

And <S%G5100>certain<s%> of them which were with us <S%G565>went<s%> to the <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> it <S%G3779>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> as the <S%G1135>women<s%> had <S%G2036>said:<s%> but him they <S%G1492>saw<s%> not.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, O <S%G453>fools,<s%> and <S%G1021>slow<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> to believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> have spoken: <S%G2980><s%>
<S%G1163>Ought<s%> not <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, and to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his glory? <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> he <S%G1329>expounded<s%> to them in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures<s%> the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>
And they drew <S%G1448>near<s%> to the <S%G2968>village,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> they <S%G4198>went:<s%> and he <S%G4364>made<s%> as though he would have <S%G4198>gone<s%> <S%G4206>further.<s%>

But they <S%G3849>constrained<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3306>Abide<s%> with us: for it is <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2073>evening,<s%> and the <S%G2250>day<s%> is far <S%G2827>spent.<s%> And he <S%G1525>went<s%> in to <S%G3306>tarry<s%> with them.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as he <S%G2625>sat<s%> <S%G2625>at<s%> meat with them, he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> it, and <S%G2806>broke,<s%> and <S%G1929>gave<s%> to them.
And their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G1272>opened,<s%> and they <S%G1921>knew<s%> him; and he <S%G1096>vanished<s%> <S%G855><s%> out of their sight.

And they <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> Did not our <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2545>burn<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> us, <S%G5613>while<s%> he <S%G2980>talked<s%> with us by the <S%G3598>way,<s%> and <S%G5613>while<s%> he <S%G1272>opened<s%> to us the <S%G1124>scriptures?<s%>

And they <S%G450>rose<s%> up the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G4867>gathered<s%> <S%G4867>together,<s%> and them that were with them,
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G3689>indeed,<s%> and has <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon.<s%>
And they <S%G1834>told<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> things were done in the <S%G3598>way,<s%> and <S%G5613>how<s%> he was <S%G1097>known<s%> of them in <S%G2800>breaking<s%> of <S%G740>bread.<s%>

And as they <S%G3778>thus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of them, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to you.
But they were <S%G4422>terrified<s%> and <S%G1719>affrighted,<s%> and <S%G1380>supposed<s%> that they had <S%G2334>seen<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> are you <S%G5015>troubled?<s%> and <S%G1302>why<s%> do <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> <S%G305>arise<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

<S%G1492>Behold<s%> my <S%G5495>hands<s%> and my <S%G4228>feet,<s%> that it is I myself: <S%G5584>handle<s%> me, and <S%G1492>see;<s%> for a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> not <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G3747>bones,<s%> as you <S%G2334>see<s%> me have. <S%G2192><s%>
And when he had <S%G5124>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he <S%G1925>showed<s%> them his <S%G5495>hands<s%> and his <S%G4228>feet.<s%>

And while they <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G569>believed<s%> not for <S%G5479>joy,<s%> and <S%G2296>wondered,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G2192>Have<s%> you <S%G1759>here<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> meat? <S%G1034><s%>
And they <S%G1929>gave<s%> him a <S%G3313>piece<s%> of a <S%G3702>broiled<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> and of an <S%G3193>honeycomb.<s%> <S%G2781><s%>
And he <S%G2983>took<s%> it, and did <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> them.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, These <S%G3778><s%> are the <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to you, while I was <S%G2089>yet<s%> with you, that <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> and in the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and in the <S%G5568>psalms,<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> me.
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1272>opened<s%> he their <S%G3563>understanding,<s%> that they might <S%G4920>understand<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures,<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G3779>Thus<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> and <S%G3779>thus<s%> it <S%G1163>behooved<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer,<s%> and to <S%G450>rise<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> day: <S%G2250><s%>

And that <S%G3341>repentance<s%> and <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%> should be <S%G2784>preached<s%> in his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>
And you are <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things.

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father<s%> on you: but <S%G2523>tarry<s%> you in the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> you be <S%G1746>endued<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> from on high. <S%G5311><s%>
And he <S%G1806>led<s%> them out as <S%G2193>far<s%> as to <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> and he <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up his <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3588><s%> he <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them, he was <S%G1339>parted<s%> from them, and <S%G399>carried<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>
And they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him, and <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy:<s%>
And were <S%G1725>continually<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G134>praising<s%> and <S%G2127>blessing<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
